resources.string:
application for storing notes, such as text, images, and audio.

 - features in the application :
 - enter notes in the form of text
 - enter a note in the form of audio
 - entering notes in the form of images
 - add favorite
 - check the note
 - timeline of calendar notes
 - random bakground color notes
 - animation actvity
 - etc.

 Thank you for the third party library, and I hope you can enjoy this. don't forget to give five stars and comment on the playstore

 -*-follow me on Instagram @mufti_nurul_azmi-*-

if you are happy with this application and according to you this application is useful please donate to my paypal muftinurulazmi@gmail.com no matter how many donations I hope God bless you.\n\n Thank you very much
